pages.text: “Momwemo (ndimo idalili mibadwo yakale pamodzi ndi aneneri awo); palibe Mthenga amene adawadzera anthu akale, anthu akowa kulibe, popanda kumnena kuti: “Ndiwamatsenga kapena wamisala.”
“Kodi adalangizana za mawuwa pakati pawo? Iyayi, koma iwo ndianthu opyola malire
“Choncho apatukire iwo (amakani), iwe suli wodzudzulidwa (pakuleka kwawo kuyankha kuitana)
“Kumbutsa. Ndithu kukumbutsa kumawathandiza okhulupirira
“Sindidalenge ziwanda (majini) ndi anthu koma kuti azindipembedza
“Sindifuna kwa iwo chithandizo ndiponso sindifuna kuti azindidyetsa
“Ndithu Allah ndi Amene amapereka rizq; Iye ndi Mwini mphamvu zoposa; Wolimba, (salaphera kanthu)
“Ndithu amene adzichitira okha chinyengo (pokana ndi kutsutsa) ali nalo gawo la chilango monga gawo la anzawo (a mibadwo yakale); choncho asandifulumizitse (kutsitsa chilango nthawi yake isanafike)
“Kuonongeka kuli pa amene atsutsa za tsiku lawo limene alonjezedwa
“Ndikulumbilira phiri la Turi (ku Sinai pamene Mûsa adalankhulana ndi Allah)
“Ndi buku lolembedwa
“M’mipukutu yazikopa zotambasuka (zosavuta kuwerenga)
“Ndi nyumba yopitako kawirikawiri (pochitamo mapemphero)
“Ndi thambo limene latukulidwa (popanda mzati)
“Ndi nyanja yodzadza ndi madzi
“Ndithu chilango cha Mbuye wako (chimene wawalonjeza nacho osakhulupirira) chiwapeza (popanda chipeneko)
“Palibe wochichotsa (pa iwo)
“Pa tsikulo thambo lidzagwedezeka; kugwedezeka kwamphamvu
“Ndipo mapiri adzayenda mwamphavu (kuchoka m’malo mwake)
“Kuonongeka koopsa pa tsiku limenelo kuzakhala pa otsutsa choonadi
“Iwo amene akungosewera mzinthu zopanda pake
“Tsiku limene adzakankhidwira mwamphamvu ku Jahannam (ku Moto Woopsa)
“(Kudzanenedwa kwa iwo): “Uwu ndi Moto uja umene mudali kuutsutsa (pa dziko lapansi)
